context_bundle.content:
Queue overflow prevention and recovery.

Symptoms:
- Producer blocks/errors
- Disk space exhaustion
- Consumer lag increasing
- Message age alerts

Causes:
- Consumer slower than producer
- Consumer failures
- Sudden traffic spike
- Retention too long

Solutions:
- Back pressure to producers
- Auto-scaling consumers
- Dead letter queues
- Message TTL
- Priority queues

Recovery:
- Add consumers
- Purge old messages (careful!)
- Increase storage
- Temporary rate limiting
